title: Awesome List Updates on May 19, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 19, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Developer tools / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-unused (‚≠ê34)](https://github.com/wgrabowski/ngx-unused) - Find declared but unused Angular classes in your codebase.

### Storage / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [indexeddb-helper (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/AshenHiroshana/indexeddb-helper) - A library designed to simplify interaction with IndexedDB in Angular applications. It provides a clean API for performing CRUD operations with support for cache expiration, data storage, and retrieval.
items.content_html:
Developer tools / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-unused (‚≠ê34) - Find declared but unused Angular classes in your codebase.

Storage / Google Developer Experts

  • indexeddb-helper (‚≠ê1) - A library designed to simplify interaction with IndexedDB in Angular applications. It provides a clean API for performing CRUD operations with support for cache expiration, data storage, and retrieval.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Communications / IoT

*   [aiomqttc](https://github.com/Tangerino/aiomqttc.git) - Asynchronous MQTT Client for Micropython AND CPython.
items.content_html:
Communications / IoT

  • aiomqttc - Asynchronous MQTT Client for Micropython AND CPython.

items.title: Awesome Playcanvas
items.content_text:
### Games / Browser Games

*   [Car Detailing Master](https://poki.com/en/g/car-detailing-master) - Clean, paint, and polish cars in this satisfying makeover game from Gamebole.
items.content_html:
Games / Browser Games

  • Car Detailing Master - Clean, paint, and polish cars in this satisfying makeover game from Gamebole.

items.title: Awesome Fiber
items.content_text:
### ‚öôÔ∏è Middlewares / üå± Third Party

*   [narmadaweb/limiter (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/narmadaweb/limiter) - A high-performance Redis-backed rate limiter middleware for Fiber, supporting fixed window, sliding window, and token bucket algorithms.
items.content_html:
‚öôÔ∏è Middlewares / üå± Third Party

  • narmadaweb/limiter (‚≠ê1) - A high-performance Redis-backed rate limiter middleware for Fiber, supporting fixed window, sliding window, and token bucket algorithms.

*   see Cake/Localized plugin below.

### Miscellaneous

*   [Tools plugin (‚≠ê336)](https://github.com/dereuromark/cakephp-tools) - Containing lots of useful helpers, behaviors, components, commands, helpers, libs and more.

Filtering and Validation

  • see Cake/Localized plugin below.
  • see Tools plugin below.

Miscellaneous

  • Tools plugin (‚≠ê336) - Containing lots of useful helpers, behaviors, components, commands, helpers, libs and more.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Analytics

*   [Liwan](https://liwan.dev/) - Privacy-first web analytics. ([Demo](https://demo.liwan.dev/p/liwan.dev), [Source Code (‚≠ê62)](https://github.com/explodingcamera/liwan)) `Apache-2.0` `Rust/Docker`
*   [Plausible Analytics](https://plausible.io/) - Simple, lightweight (< 1 KB) and privacy-friendly web analytics. ([Source Code (‚≠ê23k)](https://github.com/plausible/analytics/)) `AGPL-3.0` `Elixir`
*   [Postiz](https://postiz.com) `‚ö†` - Schedule posts, track the performance of your content, and manage all your social media accounts in one place (Alternative to Buffer, Hootsuite, Sprout Social). ([Source Code (‚≠ê22k)](https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [Prisme Analytics](https://www.prismeanalytics.com) - Privacy-focused and progressive analytics service based on Grafana. ([Source Code (‚≠ê104)](https://github.com/prismelabs/analytics)) `AGPL-3.0/MIT` `Docker`
*   [Statistics for Strava (‚≠ê880)](https://github.com/robiningelbrecht/statistics-for-strava) `‚ö†` - Statistics dashboard generated from Strava data. ([Demo](https://statistics-for-strava.robiningelbrecht.be/)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Automation

*   [pyLoad](https://pyload.net/) - Lightweight, customizable and remotely manageable downloader for 1-click-hosting sites like rapidshare.com or uploaded.to. ([Source Code (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/pyload/pyload)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python`

### Software / Booking and Scheduling

*   [QloApps](https://qloapps.com/) - Customizable and intuitive web-based hotel reservation system and a booking engine. ([Demo](https://demo.qloapps.com/), [Source Code (‚≠ê6.4k)](https://github.com/webkul/hotelcommerce)) `OSL-3.0` `PHP/Nodejs`

### Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

*   [PushBits (‚≠ê342)](https://github.com/pushbits/server) - Notification server for relaying push notifications via Matrix, similar to PushBullet and Gotify. `ISC` `Go`

### Software / Communication - Email - Complete Solutions

*   [Postal](https://docs.postalserver.io/) - Complete and fully featured mail server for use by websites & web servers. ([Source Code (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/postalserver/postal)) `MIT` `Docker/Ruby`

### Software / Communication - Social Networks and Forums

*   [PixelFed](https://pixelfed.social) - Ethical photo sharing platform, powered by ActivityPub federation (alternative to Instagram). ([Source Code (‚≠ê6.6k)](https://github.com/pixelfed/pixelfed)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / Communication - Video Conferencing

*   [plugNmeet](https://www.plugnmeet.org/) - Scalable and high performance web conferencing system. ([Demo](https://demo.plugnmeet.com/login.html), [Source Code (‚≠ê376)](https://github.com/mynaparrot/plugNmeet-server)) `MIT` `Docker/Go`

### Software / Content Management Systems (CMS)

*   [Pimcore](http://www.pimcore.com/) - Multi-channel experience and engagement management platform. ([Source Code (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/pimcore/pimcore)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`

### Software / DNS

*   [Pi-hole](https://pi-hole.net/) - Blackhole for Internet advertisements with a GUI for management and monitoring. ([Source Code (‚≠ê53k)](https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole)) `EUPL-1.2` `Shell/PHP/Docker`

### Software / Document Management

*   [PdfDing (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/mrmn2/PdfDing) - PDF manager, viewer and editor offering a seamless user experience on multiple devices. It's designed to be minimal, fast, and easy to set up using Docker. `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / E-commerce

*   [PrestaShop](https://www.prestashop.com/) - Fully scalable e-commerce solution. ([Demo](https://demo.prestashop.com/), [Source Code (‚≠ê8.6k)](https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop)) `OSL-3.0` `PHP`
*   [Pretix](https://pretix.eu/) - Ticket sales platform for events. ([Source Code (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/pretix/pretix)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python/Docker`

### Software / File Transfer & Synchronization

*   [Peergos](https://peergos.org) - Secure and private space online where you can store, share and view your photos, videos, music and documents. Also includes a calendar, news feed, task lists, chat and email client. ([Source Code (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/Peergos/Peergos)) `AGPL-3.0` `Java`

### Software / File Transfer - Single-click & Drag-n-drop Upload

*   [Pairdrop](https://pairdrop.net/) - Local file sharing in your browser, inspired by Apple's AirDrop (fork of Snapdrop). ([Source Code (‚≠ê8k)](https://github.com/schlagmichdoch/pairdrop)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [PicoShare](https://pico.rocks) - Minimalist, easy-to-host service for sharing images and other files. ([Demo](https://demo.pico.rocks), [Source Code (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare)) `AGPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`
*   [Picsur (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/CaramelFur/Picsur) - Simple imaging hosting platform that allows you to easily host, edit, and share images. ([Demo](https://picsur.org/upload)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [PictShare](https://www.pictshare.net/) - Multi lingual image hosting service with a simple resizing and upload API. ([Source Code (‚≠ê879)](https://github.com/HaschekSolutions/pictshare)) `Apache-2.0` `PHP/Docker`
*   [Plik (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/root-gg/plik) - Scalable and friendly temporary file upload system. ([Demo](https://plik.root.gg/)) `MIT` `Go/Docker`
*   [PsiTransfer (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/psi-4ward/psitransfer) - Simple file sharing solution with robust up-/download-resume and password protection. `BSD-2-Clause` `Nodejs`
*   [QuickShare](https://ihexxa.github.io/quickshare.site/) - Quick and simple file sharing between different devices. ([Source Code (‚≠ê566)](https://github.com/ihexxa/quickshare)) `LGPL-3.0` `Docker/Go`

### Software / Games

*   [Quizmaster (‚≠ê279)](https://github.com/nymanjens/quizmaster) - Web application for conducting a quiz, including a page for players to enter their answers. `Apache-2.0` `Scala`

### Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

*   [PufferPanel](https://www.pufferpanel.com/) - Game server management panel designed for both small networks and game server providers. ([Source Code (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/pufferpanel/pufferpanel)) `Apache-2.0` `Go`

### Software / Inventory Management

*   [Part-DB](https://docs.part-db.de/) - Inventory management system for your electronic components. ([Demo](https://demo.part-db.de/en/), [Source Code (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/Part-DB/Part-DB-server)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/PHP/Nodejs`

### Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

*   [Pinepods](https://www.pinepods.online/) - Podcast management system with multi-user support. Pinepods utilizes a central database so aspects like listen time and themes follow from device to device. ([Demo](https://try.pinepods.online), [Source Code (‚≠ê436)](https://github.com/madeofpendletonwool/PinePods)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [penpot](https://penpot.app/) - Web-based design and prototyping platform meant for cross-domain teams. ([Source Code (‚≠ê39k)](https://github.com/penpot/penpot)) `MPL-2.0` `Docker`
*   [POMjs](https://password.oppetmoln.se/) - Random password generator. ([Source Code (‚≠ê42)](https://github.com/joho1968/POMjs)) `GPL-2.0` `Javascript`

### Software / Note-taking & Editors

*   [Plainpad](https://alextselegidis.com/get/plainpad/) - Modern note taking application for the cloud, utilizing the best features of progressive web apps technology. ([Demo](https://alextselegidis.com/try/plainpad/), [Source Code (‚≠ê340)](https://github.com/alextselegidis/plainpad)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / Password Managers

*   [Passbolt](https://www.passbolt.com/) - Collaborative password manager. ([Source Code (‚≠ê5.2k)](https://github.com/passbolt/passbolt_api)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/deb/K8S/Docker`
*   [Passky](https://passky.org) - Simple and modern password manager with website, browser extension, android and desktop application. ([Demo](https://vault.passky.org), [Source Code (‚≠ê220)](https://github.com/Rabbit-Company/Passky-Server)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP/Docker`
*   [Psono](https://psono.com/) - Password manager for companies. ([Demo](https://www.psono.pw), [Source Code](https://gitlab.com/psono/psono-fileserver)) `Apache-2.0` `Python`

### Software / Pastebins

*   [ByteStash (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash) - Pastebin and file storage service with a simple web interface. Supports syntax highlighting, optional user authentication and public sharing. ([Demo (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/jordan-dalby/ByteStash?tab=readme-ov-file#demo)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [pacebin](https://git.swurl.xyz/swirl/pacebin.git/about/) - Super-minimal pastebin and file upload service focusing on small executable size, portability, and ease of configuration. ([Demo](https://paste.swurl.xyz), [Source Code](https://git.swurl.xyz/swirl/pacebin.git)) `AGPL-3.0` `C`
*   [Password Pusher](https://pwpush.com) - Dead-simple application to securely communicate passwords (or text) over the web. Passwords automatically expire after a certain number of views and/or time has passed. ([Source Code (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/pglombardo/PasswordPusher)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker/K8S/Ruby`
*   [Pastefy](https://pastefy.app/) - Beautiful, simple and easy to deploy Pastebin with optional client encryption, multitab pastes, an API, a highlighted editor and more. ([Source Code (‚≠ê333)](https://github.com/interaapps/pastefy), [Clients](https://github.com/topics/pastefy-addon)) `MIT` `Docker/K8S/Java`
*   [PrivateBin](https://privatebin.info/) - Minimalist pastebin/discussion board where the server has zero knowledge of hosted data. ([Demo](https://privatebin.net/), [Source Code (‚≠ê7.3k)](https://github.com/PrivateBin/PrivateBin)) `Zlib` `PHP`

### Software / Personal Dashboards

*   [portkey](https://portkey.page) - Simple web portal that serves as a startup page, displaying a compilation of links and URLs, while also allowing the addition of custom pages, all managed through a single configuration file. ([Demo](https://demo.portkey.page), [Source Code (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/kodehat/portkey)) `AGPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`

### Software / Photo Galleries

*   [Photoview](https://photoview.github.io/) - Simple and user-friendly photo gallery for personal servers. It is made for photographers and aims to provide an easy and fast way to navigate directories, with thousands of high resolution photos. ([Source Code (‚≠ê6k)](https://github.com/photoview/photoview)) `GPL-3.0` `Go/Docker`
*   [PiGallery 2](https://bpatrik.github.io/pigallery2/) - Directory-first photo gallery website, with a rich UI, optimised for running on low resource servers. ([Source Code (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/bpatrik/pigallery2)) `MIT` `Docker/Nodejs`

### Software / Software Development - API Management

*   [Panora](https://panora.dev) `‚ö†` - Add an integration catalog to your SaaS product in minutes (alternative to Merge.dev). ([Source Code (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/panoratech/Panora)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/Docker`

### Software / Software Development - Localization

*   [Weblate](https://weblate.org) - Web-based translation tool with tight version control integration. ([Source Code (‚≠ê5.2k)](https://github.com/WeblateOrg/weblate)) `GPL-3.0` `Python/Docker/K8S`

### Software / Software Development - Low Code

*   [PocketBase](https://pocketbase.io/) - Backend for your next SaaS and Mobile app in one file. ([Source Code (‚≠ê49k)](https://github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase)) `MIT` `Go/Docker`

### Software / Software Development - Project Management

*   [Pagure](https://pagure.io/pagure) - Lightweight, powerful, and flexible git-centric forge with features laying the foundation for federated and decentralized development. ([Demo](https://pagure.io/)) `GPL-2.0` `Docker/Python/deb`
*   [Phorge](https://we.phorge.it/) - Community-driven platform for collaborating, managing, organizing and reviewing software development projects. ([Source Code](https://we.phorge.it/source/phorge/)) `Apache-2.0` `PHP`
*   [Plane](https://plane.so) - Track issues, epics, and product roadmaps in the simplest way possible (alternative to JIRA, Linear and Height). ([Demo](https://app.plane.so), [Source Code (‚≠ê37k)](https://github.com/makeplane/plane)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
*   [ProjeQtOr](https://www.projeqtor.org/) - Complete, mature, multi-user project management system with extensive functionality for all phases of a project. ([Demo](https://demo.projeqtor.org/), [Source Code](https://sourceforge.net/p/projectorria/code/HEAD/tree/branches/)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / Web Servers

*   [Pomerium](https://www.pomerium.io) - Identity-aware reverse proxy, successor to now obsolete oauth\_proxy. It inserts an OAuth step before proxying your request to the backend, so that you can safely expose your self-hosted websites to public Internet. ([Source Code (‚≠ê4.3k)](https://github.com/pomerium/pomerium)) `Apache-2.0` `Go/Docker`

Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

Software / Inventory Management

Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

  • Pinepods - Podcast management system with multi-user support. Pinepods utilizes a central database so aspects like listen time and themes follow from device to device. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê436)) GPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Personal Dashboards

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:
### Configuration

*   [AnywayConfig (‚≠ê838)](https://github.com/palkan/anyway_config) - Configuration library for Ruby gems and applications, supporting multiple sources (yml, secrets) and environments.

### Documentation

*   [AnnotateRb (‚≠ê429)](https://github.com/drwl/annotaterb) - Adds database schema annotations for your ActiveRecord models as text comments as well as routes. An active and maintained hard fork of Annotate.
items.content_html:
Configuration

  • AnywayConfig (‚≠ê838) - Configuration library for Ruby gems and applications, supporting multiple sources (yml, secrets) and environments.

Documentation

  • AnnotateRb (‚≠ê429) - Adds database schema annotations for your ActiveRecord models as text comments as well as routes. An active and maintained hard fork of Annotate.

items.title: Awesome Transit
items.content_text:
### Proprietary (non-standard) vendor APIs / Rust

*   [TripGo API](https://developer.tripgo.com) - REST API for multi-modal journey planning and real-time data by [SkedGo](https://skedgo.com).

### Native Apps (closed source) / Rust

*   [TripGo](https://tripgo.com/)

### SDKs / Rust

*   [KPublicTransport](https://invent.kde.org/libraries/kpublictransport) - A C++ library for accessing realtime public transport data and for performing public transport journey queries.
*   [SkedGo's TripKit SDKs](https://developer.tripgo.com) - Open source SDKs for Android, iOS and React for accessing [SkedGo](https://skedgo.com)'s TripGo API, including trip planning UI components.
items.content_html:
Proprietary (non-standard) vendor APIs / Rust

  • TripGo API - REST API for multi-modal journey planning and real-time data by SkedGo.

Native Apps (closed source) / Rust

  • TripGo

SDKs / Rust

  • KPublicTransport - A C++ library for accessing realtime public transport data and for performing public transport journey queries.
  • SkedGo's TripKit SDKs - Open source SDKs for Android, iOS and React for accessing SkedGo's TripGo API, including trip planning UI components.

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_html:
Misc

  • SignatureAPI - API-first electronic signatures.

items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:
### Speciality Search Engines

*   [Search Abuseipdb (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/oseasfr/search-abuseipdb) - Tool to query IPs, ranges and ASN blocks in AbuseIPDB via API with CIDR notation.

### Digital Footprint Tools

*   [Mine](https://www.saymine.com/mineapp) - Mine allows you to discover where your personal data is, and reduce your online exposure to minimize digital risks.
*   [Yorba](https://yorba.co/) - Yorba helps you regain control of your digital life. We find and delete old accounts, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and unsubscribe you from emails you never open‚Äîmaking your inbox cleaner, your footprint leaner, your privacy stronger.
items.content_html:
Speciality Search Engines

  • Search Abuseipdb (‚≠ê1) - Tool to query IPs, ranges and ASN blocks in AbuseIPDB via API with CIDR notation.

Digital Footprint Tools

  • Mine - Mine allows you to discover where your personal data is, and reduce your online exposure to minimize digital risks.
  • Yorba - Yorba helps you regain control of your digital life. We find and delete old accounts, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and unsubscribe you from emails you never open‚Äîmaking your inbox cleaner, your footprint leaner, your privacy stronger.

items.title: Awesome Java
items.content_text:
### Artificial Intelligence

*   [LangChain4j (‚≠ê8.3k)](https://github.com/langchain4j/langchain4j) - Simplifies integration of LLMs with unified APIs and a comprehensive toolbox.
*   [MCP Java SDK (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/java-sdk) -  Enables applications to interact with AI models and tools through a standardized interface (i.e. Model Context Protocol), supporting both synchronous and asynchronous communication patterns.
*   [Spring AI](https://spring.io/projects/spring-ai) - Application framework for AI engineering for Spring.

### Cloud / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [AWS SDK for Java (‚≠ê4.2k)](https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-java) - Provides Java APIs for interacting with Amazon Web Services.
*   [Google Cloud Client Libraries (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/googleapis/google-cloud-java) - Client libraries for accessing Google Cloud services from Java applications.

### Functional Programming / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [Packrat (‚≠ê20)](https://github.com/jhspetersson/packrat) - Gatherers library for Java Stream API. Gatherers can enhance streams with custom intermediate operations.

### Monitoring / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [Apitally (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/apitally/apitally-java) - Simple, privacy-focused API monitoring, analytics and request logging for Spring Boot apps.

### Native / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [native-lib-loader (‚≠ê207)](https://github.com/scijava/native-lib-loader) - Native library loader for extracting and loading native libraries from Java.

### ORM / Text-Based User Interfaces

*   [MyBatis-Plus (‚≠ê17k)](https://github.com/baomidou/mybatis-plus) - A powerful enhanced toolkit of MyBatis for simplifying development.

### Reactive libraries / Other

*   [Reactor (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/reactor/reactor) - A framework for building non-blocking applications on the JVM, providing support for reactive programming.

### Related Awesome Lists / Mocking

*   [Awesome Java libraries and hidden gems](https://libs.tech/java)
